title: Sound problems
body: My game sound often starts really low in volume, and then gets louder at around the 5-10 min mark of a game.  It's really annoying.  Thanks for any advice.

replies.body:
Huh...that sounds incredibly odd.  To be honest, I'm not entirely sure what could be causing this.  There are multiple voice chat programs that will lower in-game audio to favor voice volume (such as Skype), but I'm not sure why it would stop after 5-10 min.  If you are running any of these programs, you may want to try temporarily disabling them!

Otherwise, if you are still experiencing issues, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  One of our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
